name: Future Racer 2000
description:
I CANNOT FOR THE LIFE OF MY FIGURE OUT HOW TO ADD A SOUNDTRACK ON STEAM. IF YA PURCHASED THE GAME AND WANT THE SOUNDTRACK, JOIN THE DISCORD CHANNEL AND MESSAGE ME THERE. ILL SEND IT ON OVER.

THIS IS THE NEWEST BREAKTHROUGH IN FUTURE TECHNOLOGY! RACE AS A MYSTERIOUS RACER FROM THE FUTURE WHO MUST RACE!

FEATURES INCLUDE

  • SYNTHWAVE
  • YOUR OWN 1980's BEDROOM FILLED WITH YOUR FAVORITE POSTERS
  • A BRAND NEW VIDEO GAME CONSOLE - NEVER BEFORE SEEN!
  • CUTTING EDGE GRAPHICS WITH 256 COLORS - AND MORE!
  • PLAY 3 RADICAL TUNES ON A STATE-OF-THE-ART SYNTHESIZER
  • WATCH THE NEWEST EPISODE OF SLUGS&MONEY! NO ChugTV SUBSCRIPTION NEEDED!
  • RACE AGAINST 7 COMPUTER PLAYERS FOR THE TITLE OF FUTURE RACER 2000!!!
  • BEIGE HALLWAY

THINGS TO KNOW:


The whole experience seems to take 30-40 minutes, depending on the player.

Peep the discord to share any bugs, suggestions, or just say "hey!"
Check out my twitch if ya wanna see BTS stuff.

CONTROLS

FIRST PERSON CONTROLS

  • WASD for movement
  • SPACE/Left CLICK for interact
  • Q - VIEW WHAT YOU GOTTA DO
  • ESC/TAB - PAUSE
  • F - DONT WORRY ABOUT IT

RACING CONTROLS


  • WASD for corresponding directional arrow
  • SPACE/LEFT click for next screen
  • F - IT DOESNT WORK DURING THE RACE SO SERIOUSLY DONT WORRY ABOUT IT.
  • YOU CANT PAUSE DURING A RACE. ALL GAS AND NO BRAKES BB!


THIS IS MY FIRST GAME SO THERE MAY BE A FEW BUGS. IM HOPING THERE ARENT. BUT IF THERE ARE, PULLEEEASE LET ME KNOW AND ILL FIX EM. I SPENT A LOT OF TIME ON THIS SO IF SOMETHING GOES WRONG, I WANNA MAKE IT BETTER.
